data.name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE: WORLD BROTHERS - Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Original Blue Swimsuit
data.detailed_description:
Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto),
a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series,
is joining the EDF, appearing in her Original Blue Swimsuit.
She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is joining the EDF, appearing in her Original Blue Swimsuit. She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.

*languages with full audio support
